# National Board of Review Awards 1929

1st National Board of Review Awards
1929
{| border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center"
|-
| style="border: 1px" |
|}
The 1st National Board of Review Awards were announced in 1929.
Top Ten Films
*Applause
*Broadway
*Bulldog Drummond
*The Case of Lena Smith
*Disraeli
*Hallelujah!
*The Letter
*The Love Parade
*Paris Bound
*The Valiant
Top Foreign Films
*Arsenal
*The Passion of Joan of Arc
*October: Ten Days That Shook the World
*Piccadilly
*Homecoming
External links
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20070929103045/http://www.nbrmp.org/awards/past.cfm?year=1929 National Board of Review of Motion Pictures :: Awards for 1929]
